constants.name: spectrometer_x_reflector_geometry
constants.header: Geometry of a planar or curved object

int.name: outline
int.description: Planar object described by an outline in the (X1,X2) plane

int.name: circular
int.description: Circle in the (X1,X2) plane, defined by its centre and radius

int.name: rectangle
int.description: Rectangle in the (X1,X2) plane, defined by its centre and widths in the X1 and X2 directions

int.name: cylindrical
int.description: Cylindrical, defined by its centre, curvature radius and angular span in the X1 direction, and width in the X2 direction

int.name: spherical
int.description: Spherical, defined by its centre, curvature radius (same in both X1 and X2 directions) and angular spans in the X1 and X2 directions

int.name: elliptical
int.description: Elliptical, defined by its centre, curvature radii and angular spans in the X1 and X2 directions
